page.title: 05SETTLEMENT:CUMMOCK VALLEY-2
page.content:
Today few people live in the valley. Fewer work in it. Only one colliery row still has families living in it.
We counted nine inhabited houses. Two of these are quite recent and a third has been extended. Of all these homes three are on farms and all but one are within easy reach of the B741 which threads the valley.
The school was demolished after mining subsidence made it unsafe. At the end it served only children with pronounced learning difficulties. Some of these children travelled long distances daily by contract transport.
